cause.description:
We are Jordanians one nation wherever we descend from 4get about being from north, south or the middle we are all Jordanians one hand there is no am Salti or am Irbidawy or am Karaki there is only one sure thing that we are all native Jordanians we belong to one land and its the Jordanian land that we all love and we are all willing to die for if we don't kill these differences and disgreements and our tribal racism we won't be able to save the country that embraces us all so please let our beleives unite in this thing and lets work on a better new culture that will keep us always up in the sky and lets all remember that we are all Jordanians.
1. Jordan is a united country
2. Jordanians are one nation
3. its our Jordan
cause.name: You are Jordanian
